item.title: Chef notes
item.description: Sometime back I had to fiddle with Chef. I created some notes, posting it over here, so that I won’t loose it. Don’t think it’ll be useful much to anyone else other than me :) Its basically a list of instructions that is scattered on their site. So, anyone other than me, please ignore this post! Write a cookbook chef generate repo ~/chef-repo => Install starter kit to create .
